content.description: The following segmented bar chart shows the number of flights that were either on time or delayed at three different airports on one day.
content.question: Which of the following statements is supported by the bar chart?

choices.label: Airport T has the greatest percentage of on-time flights compared to the other two airports.
Airport R has the least percentage of on-time flights compared to the other two airports.
The number of on-time flights at Airport S is half the number of on-time flights at Airport T.
The number of on-time flights at Airport R is less than the number of on-time flights at Airport S.
The number of flights at Airport T is equal to the total number of flights at Airports R and S combined.

content.answer: The number of on-time flights at Airport S is half the number of on-time flights at Airport T.
